meanings: wait, hold on, (informal) hang on, (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await, (고대하다) look forward to
초대와 방문 Have you been waiting?
약속 Did you have to wait long?
약속 Have you been waiting for a long time?
약속 When did you get here?
레스토랑 SOS I've been waiting for 30 minutes already.
실용회화-약속을 어겼을 때 I've been waiting for an hour.

examples.korean: Waited an hour in line for a burger, but it was totally worth it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 버거 하나 때문에 줄서서 한 시간을 기다렸어. 하지만 그럴 만한 가치가 충분히 있었어. DARAKWON

examples.korean: 15,000 won for a burger that’s average at best and a wait of over 30 minutes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 좋게 봐도그저 그런 버거 하나에 15,000원인데다가 30분이나 기다렸어. DARAKWON
